paragraphs.body: Despite not being animated the same way as regular airbending, should the image of flying bison in the air count as airbending images, or at least the flight subcategory? Omnibender - Talk - Contributions 20:34, July 4, 2015 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: Despite not being animated the same way as regular airbending, should the image of flying bison in the air count as airbending images, or at least the flight subcategory? Omnibender - Talk - Contributions 20:34, July 4, 2015 (UTC)
